entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Multiple Selection On Collection View #11023
  • [Switch] ReturnsNonEmptyNativeBoundingBounds(1) fails on Android #11020
    Backlog
  • IOS ListView with HasUnevenRows = True crashes app - bug has been reintroduced #11019
  • iOS ScrollView inside VerticalStackLayout Crashes with infinite height measurement #11017
    Backlog
  • Flyout menu vanished #11011
    Backlog
  • AngularJS is not rendering in WebView on Android #11007
    Backlog
  • App.Current.RequestedThemeChanged never fires #11005
    Backlog
  • Android WebViewClient's ShouldInterceptRequest is never called in MAUI WebView #11004
    Backlog
  • The bottom tab bar is invisible after setting Shell.CurrentItem #11003
    Backlog

Closed

  • Changing the root page when navigating crashes the application on Android #10824
    7.0
  • Different behavior HorizontalStackLayout #10848
    Backlog
  • Error ADB0010: Mono.AndroidTools.InstallFailedException: Failure [INSTALL_FAILED_USER_RESTRICTED: Install canceled by user] #10829
    Backlog
  • Clicking with a mouse will make it impossible to change focus by code #10992
  • Shell TabBar displays huge images (ios/macos) #10993
  • XAML Hot Reload fails with TypeConverter for RowDefinitionCollection error #10679
    7.0
  • .NET 7 support in MAUI #9192
    7.0
  • Text alignment not respected in migrated project #10728
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Add await for color check to avoid crash and fix DispatcherTest #11022
  • Consolidate handlertestbase #11021
  • Add missing await call for color match test #11016
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22524.2 to 7.0.0-preview1.22531.1 #11009
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Allow Button.ImageSource to be updated on Android, iOS and macOS #11008
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨

Merged

  • Fix Author Name #11015
  • Update PR template #11012

Updated

  • [Android] Implement logic to move focus to next Entry #5740
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, do-not-merge, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, .NET 7 Planning
  • [iOS] RadioButton a11y #10832
    area/a11y, area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #10985
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Move init to mapper and move test components to reusable test runner library #10751
  • Fix shadow visibility on Windows #10996
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • _itemsSource may be null in CarouselViewLoopManager #11000
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
  • Update Editor.cs To solve HorizontalTextAlignment problem #10981
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • Add HttpClient factory for UriImageSource #10995
    area/image :framed_picture:, community ✨
  • Fix SwitchCell not compliant with best accessibility practices #6899
    area/a11y, community ✨, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [Android] Fix crash using Page IsBusy property #9783
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮
